DOC.criteria: Age 18 22 year ; Having Oral hygiene adequate ( OHI < 1.1 ) ; Having 20 natural teeth incluing molar ; Not havind oral disease . Biofilm baseline pH > 5,5 ; Not signature consent term ; Using orthodontic appliance ; Having use medicine last 3 month ; Pregant woman .
